snippet.title: Mythical Games E3 2021 Keynote | Blankos Block Party | E3 2021
snippet.description:
Mythical Games announced that Blankos Block Party will be partnering with Deadmau5, The Marathon Company, and Burberry to create limited edition Blankos, collectible and playable NFTs. Download Blankos for free on PC right now: https://get.blankos.com/c/jutddl

Other announcements include upcoming Blankos with partner artists, including Michael Lau, Quiccs, Thomas Han, El Grand Chamaco. 

Mythical’s first flagship title Blankos Block Party is an open-world multiplayer party game with a heavy focus on player-designed levels and playable NFTs. Unlike other games where the content you pay for is licensed and leased, Blankos Block Party offers players ownership of their digital assets, allowing the community to not only buy and sell their items in secondary marketplaces for fiat or cryptocurrency but to dictate the value and scarcity of their collections.

The stars of Blankos Block Party are collectible vinyl toys called Blankos, designed by some of the world’s top brands and vinyl toy artists including John-Paul Kaiser, Junko Mizuno, and Pete Fowler. Each Blanko is part of a limited mint, recorded to the blockchain as a non-fungible token (NFT). Available now in free-to-play Early Access on PC, the immersive world is styled like a giant block party where players can compete in minigames created by the community or by Mythical, build their own games to share, take on daily challenges, and more!

#BlankosBlockParty #PlayToEarn #E32021
